comment: Mrs. Bates is very unclear with assignment guidelines. I would not recommend. Take someone else!

There were a few rude people in my class, but my professor kept her cool and controlled the class in a diligent manner.  As my advisor, my professor was a huge help and I am grateful for having such an awesome professor and advisor.  I've learned a lot both socially and emotionally.
Must Read Every Chapter.  Great Speakers.  Participation is expected.  Lots of short reflections.  Enthusiastic Teacher.

She can be extremely confusing at times and frequently contradicts here self on which assignments are due. She lets her emotions get the best of her in the class room sometimes and lashes out at her students; berating them. If you follow what the rubric says and check your student email constantly, you should be fine. Easy work, just lots of it.
